recipe: Combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Toss well and serve chilled.
Season salmon fillets with olive oil, garlic, and dill. Grill until cooked. Roast asparagus with olive oil and season with salt. Serve together.
Cook sweet potatoes and lentils in a curry sauce with coconut milk, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve over brown rice.
Layer Greek yogurt with berries and granola in a glass. Drizzle with honey. Repeat the layers and enjoy a delicious and nutritious parfait.

food_name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
recipe: Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until crispy. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.
Combine orange segments, grapefruit, and kiwi. Sprinkle with chopped mint. Serve chilled.
Blend spinach, mixed berries, banana, and almond milk. Enjoy a nutritious green smoothie.
Top sushi rice with grilled salmon, avocado slices, and seaweed. Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame seeds.
Combine diced mango, cucumber, red onion, and cilantro. Squeeze lime juice over the salad and toss gently.
Saute sweet potatoes and kale. Mix with beaten eggs and bake until set. Slice into wedges and serve.
Grill chicken breast and slice into strips. Toss with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and a light vinaigrette.
Cook quinoa and mix with black beans, corn, avocado, and salsa. Top with lime wedges and cilantro.
Layer Greek yogurt with mixed berries, granola, and sliced almonds. Drizzle with honey for added sweetness.
Stuff bell peppers with a mixture of cooked quinoa, flaked salmon, spinach, and feta cheese. Bake until peppers are tender.
Stir-fry tofu with broccoli, bell peppers, and snap peas. Season with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
Layer sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Stir-fry a mix of colorful vegetables such as broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots with tofu. Season with soy sauce and ginger.
Sauté mushrooms and spinach, then mix with cooked risotto. Add Parmesan cheese and stir until creamy.
Cook chickpeas and spinach in a curry sauce with coconut milk, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Serve over rice.
Toss capellini pasta with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil. Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
Combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, and cilantro. Dress with a lime vinaigrette and toss well.
Mix chia seeds with almond milk, vanilla extract, and a touch of honey. Refrigerate until it thickens, then top with fresh berries.
Cut sweet potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil, paprika, and garlic powder. Roast until crispy and serve with a yogurt dip.
Cook quinoa and top with roasted broccoli, chickpeas, and a tahini dressing. Garnish with sesame seeds.
Cook oats with almond milk and top with a mix of fresh berries, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.
Combine sliced cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and dill. Dress with a light vinaigrette for a refreshing salad.
Skewer bell peppers, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, and mushrooms. Grill until vegetables are tender. Serve with a squeeze of lemon.
Spiralize zucchini into noodles and toss with homemade pesto made from basil, garlic, pine nuts, and Parmesan.
Stuff bell peppers with a mixture of cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, and salsa. Bake until peppers are tender.
Marinate shrimp in lemon juice and garlic. Grill or sauté until cooked. Serve over a bed of mixed greens.
Blend acai berries with banana, almond milk, and a touch of honey. Top with granola, sliced bananas, and coconut flakes.
Spread almond butter on whole grain toast and top with banana slices. Sprinkle with chia seeds for an extra boost.

food_name: Green Tea and Chia Seed Pudding
recipe: Mix chia seeds with green tea, almond milk, and a bit of honey. Refrigerate until it thickens, then top with fresh berries.
Combine oats, nuts, honey, and nut butter. Form into bite-sized balls. Refrigerate until firm and grab for a quick energy boost.
Blend spinach, banana, Greek yogurt, and almond milk. Enjoy a nutrient-packed smoothie to kickstart your day.
Grill chicken breast and slice into strips. Toss with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
Marinate salmon fillets in teriyaki sauce, garlic, and ginger. Grill or bake until cooked. Serve with steamed broccoli.
Sauté shrimp in garlic, butter, and white wine. Toss with cooked pasta, lemon zest, and parsley.
Stir-fry thinly sliced beef with colorful vegetables in soy sauce and ginger. Serve over steamed rice.
Marinate lamb chops with olive oil, rosemary, and garlic. Grill until desired doneness. Serve with mint sauce.

food_name: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill
recipe: Marinate salmon with lemon, olive oil, and dill. Bake until flaky. Serve with steamed asparagus and quinoa.
Cook oatmeal with almond milk. Top with fresh berries, sliced almonds, and a drizzle of honey.
Blend spinach, avocado, banana, Greek yogurt, and almond milk for a creamy and nutritious smoothie.
Toss mixed vegetables with olive oil, garlic, and herbs. Roast until tender. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil before serving.

food_name: Detox Water with Cucumber and Mint
recipe: Infuse water with cucumber slices, mint leaves, and a splash of lemon. Chill and enjoy a refreshing detox drink.
Combine cooked quinoa, kale, shredded carrots, and broccoli. Toss with a lemon-tahini dressing for a detoxifying salad.
Brew a cup of hot water with turmeric, ginger, and lemon. Strain and enjoy this cleansing tea.

food_name: Baked Cod with Lemon and Herbs
recipe: Marinate cod fillets with lemon, garlic, and herbs. Bake until fish is flaky. Serve with steamed asparagus.
Marinate chicken cubes with olive oil, lemon, and herbs. Skewer with colorful vegetables and grill until chicken is cooked.
Grate cauliflower to resemble rice. Stir-fry with colorful vegetables, lean protein, and a splash of soy sauce.

food_name: Mixed Greens Salad with Grilled Shrimp
recipe: Toss mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and grilled shrimp. Dress with a light vinaigrette.
Blend spinach, mixed berries, Greek yogurt, and a touch of honey. Pour into a bowl and top with granola.

Marinate chicken with minced garlic, lemon juice, and herbs. Roast until golden brown and juicy.
Brew green tea and add a spoonful of honey. Enjoy this warm and soothing beverage for immune support.
Make a hearty soup with kale, white beans, carrots, and onions. Season with turmeric and ginger for added immunity benefits.
Blend chocolate protein powder, banana, almond milk, and a scoop of peanut butter for a delicious post-workout shake.
Combine grilled chicken, quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a drizzle of olive oil for a balanced post-exercise meal.

food_name: Greek Yogurt with Berries and Granola
recipe: Top Greek yogurt with fresh berries and granola to replenish protein and carbohydrates post-workout.

Combine diced watermelon with fresh mint leaves. Chill and serve for a refreshing and hydrating salad.

Blend coconut water with pineapple chunks and ice for a tropical and hydrating smoothie.
Mix chia seeds with coconut water and let it sit until it forms a pudding-like consistency. Top with fresh berries.
Combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, and cilantro. Dress with a lime vinaigrette and toss well.

Cook oats with almond milk and top with a mix of fresh berries, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.

food_name: Quinoa Salad with Pomegranate and Walnuts
recipe: Combine cooked quinoa with pomegranate seeds, walnuts, and a light balsamic vinaigrette. Toss well and serve.
